ANNOgesic - Transcriptome annotation pipeline

Installation

Quick search

Required tools or databases¶

Please also check our Docker image. Via Docker image, all the required tools are installed.

Tools¶

Python : version higher or equal to 3.4

BioPython: version higher or equal to 1.65

BioPerl: version higher or equal to 1.6.1

Blast+ : version higher or equal to 2.2.28+ (for sRNA_detection)

ImageMagick : version higher or equal to 6.9.0-0 (for generate screenshot)

Infernal : version higher or equal o 1.1.1 (for riboswitch and RNA thermometer detection)

Matplotlib : version higher or equal to 1.5.0 (for generate all statistics figure)

Networkx : version higher or equal to 1.10 (for generate PPI figure)

MEME : version higher or equal to 4.11.1 (for promoter detection)

GLAM2 : version higher or equal to 4.11.1 (for promoter detection)

MPICH : version higher or equal to 3.2 (for parallel version of promoter detection)

RATT : version higher or equal to 1.64 (for annotation transfer) Please be attation, before you start to run RATT (annotation transfer), run source $PAGIT_HOME/sourceme.pagit first. it will modify the path for execute RATT. If you run ANNOgesic through Docker container, you can skip this step.

Psortb : version higher or equal to 3.0 (for subcellular localization detection)

Samtools : version higher or equal to 1.3.1 (using htslib 1.3.1) (for SNP calling, CircRNA_detection)

Bcftools : version higher or equal to 1.3.1 (using htslib 1.3.1) (for SNP calling)

Segemehl : version higher or equal to 0.1.9 (for CircRNA_detection) When you install Segemehl, please type ‘make all’ instead of ‘make’ after running configure. Otherwise, the testrealign.x won’t appear.

TranstermHP : version higher or equal to 2.09 (for rho-independent terminator prediction)

TSSpredator : version higher or equal to 1.06 (for TSS and processing site prediction, TSS optimization)

ViennaRNA : version higher or equal to 2.2.5 (for rho-independent terminator prediction, sRNA detection, sRNA_target detection)

Ps2pdf14 (for sRNA detection)

IGV (for screenshot and color_png)

CRT: version higher or equal to 1.2 (for CRISPR detection)

Databases¶

BSRD (for sRNA detection)

nr database (for sRNA detection)

Rfam (for riboswitch and RNA thermometer detection)

idmapping_selected.tab from Uniprot (for Go term detection)

goslim.obo (for Go term detection)

go.obo (for Go term detection)

species.v${VERSION}.txt from STRING (for protein-protein interaction prediction; replace ${VERSION} by the version you would like to use)
